original_title: Frank Lloyd Wright: Murder, Myth and Modernism
overview: Frank Lloyd Wright is an American icon - its most famous modern architect, and probably its most prolific - over 400 buildings in a 60-year career. Frank Lloyd Wright: Murder, Myth & Modernism is a dramatic, surprising and entertaining portrait of a master builder whose most enduring edifice is his own legend.
title: Frank Lloyd Wright: Murder, Myth and Modernism
